billEvents.eventText: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

title: Requires public authorities to negotiate with most qualified architectural and engineering professional firms before negotiating with other firms
summary: Requires public authorities and public benefit corporations to negotiate with professional firms providing architectural or engineering services in order from the most qualified to the least qualified with regard to the provision of services to the authority or corporation.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to requiring public authorities and public benefits corporations to negotiate with professional firms providing architectural or engineering services in order from the most qualified to the least qualified with regard to the provision of services to the authority or corporation
